list-item.p: Study characteristics, that is, author, year of publication, study type (randomised trial, non-randomised study) and design (superiority, non-inferiority trial), study status (eg, planned, ongoing, completed, prematurely discontinued), start and end of study.
Details on sample size (number of participants screened and randomised/finally included; reasons for screening failures and number and reasons for drop-offs and compliance).
Setting, that is, geographical and organisational setting.
Characteristics and definition of participants (age, gender, tumour histology and tumour stage).
Details on neoadjuvant therapy (drug names, dose).
Details on the diagnostic methods used for post-neoadjuvant tumour staging and surveillance of tumour response.
Characteristics of intervention/surveillance group (definition of surveillance).
Characteristics of comparator/surgery group (type of surgery and time between neoadjuvant therapy and surgery).
Pathohistological complete response rate after neoadjuvant therapy (surgery group).
All reported outcomes and their exact definitions, that is, how and when the outcome measures were assessed.
Recruitment and follow-up time (planned and actual time).
